name: Cleaver
description: Very high damage but very slow attack speed.

name: Warrior
description: High health and fairly good melee damage.

name: Plasma Marines
description: Ranged Minions with average damage, speed and health.

name: Grenadier
description: Throws explosives, good at dealing with groups of enemies.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Destroy a random enemy Minion or Building.

name: Living Statue
description: Has a lot of health, but only attacks buildings.Call Slitherbound.

name: Dragon Whelp
description: Has wings, which is good against melee ground minions.

name: Scrat Pack
description: Five weak melee minions, good for taking bridges and as cheap targets.

name: Ghost Turret
description: Defensive Building with good damage and attack speed.Spectral Essence.

name: Fireball
description: Great against groups of low to medium health enemies.

name: Boomer
description: Hatches from an <link="actor_info:BoomerEgg>egg</link> after a short delay. The Boomer explodes on contact or death and deals a lot of area damage!

name: Swarmers
description: Swarmers are fast and have decent damage but low health.

name: Succubus
description: Teleports away from melee attacks when hit.

name: Swarmer Totem
description: Summons groups of 2 <link="actor_info:Swarmer>Swarmers</link> over time.

name: Demon Warrior
description: From the 5th time this card is played and beyond, Demon Warrior has +350 health and +300 damage.

name: Cannon Roller
description: Powerful single target shooter that rolls backwards when shooting

name: Ghost
description: Possesses an enemy, turning it to your side. The enemy becomes Cursed and gains Spectral Essence.

name: Last Stand
description: Summons 5 <link="actor_info:Legionair>Legionnaires</link>, but 7 if your opponent controls both bridges!

name: All In
description: Plays all other cards in your hand for free, but you reduce your life by 50%. All in, baby!

name: Sniper Scrat
description: A Scrat with a sniper rifle. Very long range and good damage, but takes a while to aim.

name: Soul Stealer
description: Sucks out the soul of anyone he kills, increasing his attack speed!(Max 300% bonus).

name: Bridge Shrine
description: ERROR_Generates [math:[av:BridgeShrine.LifeTime]/[math:[v:GeneratePowerOverTime.POWER_DELAY]/1000]] XP over [av:BridgeShrine.LifeTime] sec - regards, XP INC.When in Mana Frenzy the shrine overheats and takes [v:TakeDamageOverTimeExtraDuringManaFrenzy.OVERHEAT_MULTIPLIER]x decay damage.

name: Assassin
description: The Assassin stays invisible while not attacking or taking damage. Deals triple damage when he attacks from invisibility.

name: Blind Date
description: Summons a random 5-mana minion card.

name: Divine Warrior
description: A typical warrior woman... BUT! She comes with a shield that makes her immune to damage for 5 sec.

name: Scrat Horde
description: Summons a horde of small squeaky Scrats.

name: Mana Puff
description: When on a bridge it generates 1 mana every 10 sec.

name: Defenso Chopper
description: When hit by melee attackers, it deals 100 counter damage and stuns them for 3 seconds.

name: Banner Man
description: When played, he gives a Shield to the 5 closest Friendly Minions in 8 range.

name: Healing Fireball
description: Heals all friendly minions by 400. Yes, it is a HEALING fireball...

name: Shock Rock
description: Drop a stunning stone on your enemies, which stuns and damages them.

name: Stun Blast
description: A large stun explosion, that leaves your enemies vulnerable.

name: Wizard Puff
description: If it dies, Destroy a random enemy Minion or Building and turn it into a friendly Mana Puff.

name: Priestess
description: She will constantly heal a nearby damaged friendly Minion.

name: Re-Boomer
description: Hatches from an <link="actor_info:ReBoomerEgg>egg</link> after a short delay. As a Boomer it explodes on contact or death, but like a phoenix another one will rise from the slime.

name: Colossus
description: It swipes enemies in a huge arc in front of it. It's probably the best at what it does.

name: Beam of DOOM!
description: A popular UFO weapon, deals massive damage in a small area.

name: Laser Turret
description: When staying on the same target, it fires faster and faster.

name: Whirly Scrat
description: A melee area damage dealer with decent health - has a hard time socializing.

name: Illusory Cleaver
description: Summons an illusion of a Cleaver with little health and no damage - but it explodes when killed for 30 damage!

name: Troubadour
description: He only ever learned one song, but to compensate he plays it constantly. This makes all nearby enemies interested in stopping him!

name: Snake Druid
description: A flying wiseman, who uses his favorite branches to immobilize enemies for 6 seconds.

name: Dragon Pack
description: A devastating pack of flying evil. And cuteness

name: Scrat Launcher
description: Massive range, always shoots at the nearest enemy building.Scrats go in; screaming, rocket-powered balls of fur come out.

name: Drone Walker
description: Solid ranged attacker with no fear.

name: Legionnaires
description: A tough group of melee fighters.

name: Harbinger
description: Wields the most powerful magic of the Slither Lords, but his slavedriving days have taught him to let others do the rushing.

name: Annihilator
description: This is as big as guns get.. Yes, it does area damage!

name: Stun Lancers
description: Their attacks will stun any enemy for two whole seconds! Shocking!

name: Disruptor Puffs
description: When on a bridge they each increase the mana cost of a random opponent card SLOT by 2.

name: Dragon Nest
description: Summons a <link="actor_info:FlightlessDragon>Flightless Dragon</link> whenever its Master plays a Spell. Summons a <link="actor_info:DragonWhelp>Dragon Whelp</link> instead if the spell cost 5+ mana.

name: Crossbow Guild
description: Place a guild of jolly <link="actor_info:CrossbowDude>Crossbow Dudes</link> that will summon jolly dudes over time.

name: Future Past
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with a random 1-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 1.

name: Call To Arms
description: Replace each of your non-master Buildings with a <link="actor_info:Warrior>Warrior</link>.

name: Blood Imps
description: Small ritualistic imps. Their Master loses health equal to the damage they take - even overkill damage!

name: Trick Swap
description: Swaps the location of ALL minions on both bridges and stuns enemies for 4 sec.

name: Crossbow Dudes
description: Cheap ranged unit group, low health and damage, but good friends.

name: Black Hole
description: Sucks up ALL minions in an area, removing them from the board for the rest of the spell's duration.

name: Burn The Bridges
description: Both bridges get covered in flames, dealing 40 damage per sec to unfortunate ground enemies. Lasts 5 sec.

name: Tombstone
description: ERROR_A tombstone with [av:Tombstone.MaxHealth] health that activates after [math:[v:RessurectNextDeadUnitAfterTime.DEPLOY_TIME]/1000] seconds and resurrecting the next friendly minion that dies.

name: Infiltration
description: Summon 4 <link="actor_info:PlasmaMarine>Plasma Marines</link> wherever you want!

name: Daggerfall
description: Great against hordes of low health enemies, such as Scrats!

name: Bounty Sniper
description: Gives its Master extra XP for each of its kills and attacks on the enemy tower.

name: Blastmancer
description: When attacking an enemy that dies, all enemies take 20 damage - he's a real party killer!Spectral Essence.

name: Styxi
description: He gets depressed when he misses a kill shot, making him aim carefully for 6 sec before he shoots again! Luckily he's good at hiding.

name: Gax the World Bomb
description: ERROR_Hatches from an [actorinfo:GaxEgg,egg] after a short delay. On contact or death, he blows up to deal [av:Gax.Damage] damage to EVERYTHING.

name: Rammer
description: Moves fast towards buildings (he hates them), efficient at deconstruction!

name: Zeppelin Bomber
description: Flying over the battlefield it drops bombs on unsuspecting buildings!

name: Blue Golem
description: Solid as a Rock, hard to destroy and it hurts when it hits you.

name: Rampage
description: Gives friendly Minions Rage.

name: Heal Puff
description: When on a bridge it heals its Master by 25 health per sec.

name: Red Golem
description: When played, it gains double health if its Master is below 50% health

name: Scrat Tank
description: When not attacking, the Scrat Tank closes its lid and becomes completely immune to damage and stuns.

name: Raging Reinforcements
description: Summons a Dragon Whelp or a Warrior or 4 Crossbow Dudes and gives them Rage.

name: Wall
description: Plenty of health, no attack. A perfect distraction for building haters

name: Spiritmancer
description: Rips the spirit from dying enemies it's attacking and gives a random friendly minion Spirit.Spectral Essence.

name: Undying Skeleton
description: Average melee Minion that leaves an Undying Corpse the first time it dies. As if defying death once wasn't enough!Spectral Essence.

name: Walking Blind Date
description: TauntWalks along peacefully until killed, then Summons a random 4 mana Minion card!

name: Propeller Scrats
description: Small, quick and unarmored, just like normal Scrats - except they tied propellers to their tails!

name: Tranquil Shi-Hou
description: An old but durable fighter that heals itself when no enemies are near. Not a big fan of monkey business

name: Battle Shi-Hou
description: A fierce fighter who attacks faster when surrounded by enemy Minions (Max 350% bonus). Also, a big fan of monkey business.

name: Chain Lightning
description: A roaring streak of lightning that deals damage and stuns. It jumps to nearest enemy until there are none left within range.

name: Spear Throwers
description: A group of average melee fighters, but their first attack is a ranged spear with double damage!

name: Guardian
description: This hunk of health guards all nearby Crystal Elf Minions, absorbing any damage they take from outside sources.

name: Shield Totem
description: Summon a Shield Totem that makes the Master Tower immune to damage as long as it is alive.

name: Spirit Vessel
description: On death, give a random friendly Minion Spirit.

name: Xiao Long
description: Each time an opponent casts a Spell, Xiao Long gains Rage, Frenzy and Shield.

name: Bazooka Scrat
description: Light ranged Minion that deals heavy damage to buildings only.

name: Arbiter
description: Conceals nearby friendly minions

name: Hypnotize
description: After a short delay, enemy minions caught in the area are hypnotized and join your side for 5 seconds.Call Slitherbound.

name: Magma Storm
description: Calls down 10 magma rocks in a large area. Magma rocks deals damage to ANYTHING!.

name: Spirit Infusion
description: Summons 3 Spirits over 9 seconds. Each Spirit flies to a random friendly Minion and gives it Spirit.

name: Arcane Missiles
description: Fires 5 arcane missiles in the selected direction. Each missile hits the first enemy in the way and deals 30 damage.

name: Arcane Golem
description: Mystical ranged unit fueled by magic. When its Master casts a spell, it gains +40 health and +6 damage

name: Fire Imp
description: A pyromaniac whose magic leaves fire on the ground to incinerate groups of enemies.

name: Future Present
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with a random 2-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 2.

name: Shielded Crossbow Dudes
description: Still a group of weak ranged units. Still great friends. Now comes with a Shield.

name: Cursed Fireball
description: All enemy Minions in the impact area are Cursed.

name: Prowler
description: This monster was bred to hunt. It is well known for pouncing on unsuspecting enemies dealing double damage!

name: Elite Swarmer
description: A fast and somewhat durable monster. The armor plating does it.

name: S.T.INT
description: The Single-Track Interceptor - or S.T.INT - is fast, agile and packs quite a punch for its size. Can't take much punishment though.

name: Drone Buzzers
description: Known as Buzzers because they're small and irritating, and a good swat takes care of them.

name: "Armored" Scrats
description: These Scrats are surprisingly hardy. Maybe they're not just regular Scrats wearing a barrel.

name: More Dakka!
description: Ratbo charges up for 1 sec, then shoots the nearest enemy for 40 damage per friendly Minion on the field. Reduced damage to Master Towers.

name: Commander Azali
description: Big and strong, the Commander will show the way!When you take a bridge, she grants a Shield to all friendly ground Minions.

name: AtG Drone x8
description: A tough but slow flier with only Air-to-Ground weaponry. Shoots at all nearby targets.

name: Healing Shrine
description: Heals all nearby friendly minions over time.

name: Combustion
description: Each affected Friendly Minion explodes after a delay, dealing damage to itself and nearby Enemies.

name: Musketeer
description: An elegant fencer who periodically will duck, dip, and deflect melee attackers, then riposte for double damage.Call Slitherbound.

name: Morgrul the Swarmer King
description: On Summon and on Death, Morgrul roars calling 2 <link="actor_info:Swarmer>Swarmers</link> to his side. The roar also deals 50 damage and knocks nearby ground enemies back.

name: Scott The Sensitive Savage
description: When Scott drops below half health, he will sit down and Cry for 5 seconds.Create an annoying sound that taunts all nearby enemy Units.

name: Flightless Dragons
description: In baby dragon world you play rough. Unfortunately, pissing off your big sister could make her take a bite out of your wing.

name: Gor'Rakk Sacrifice
description: Disables a random friendly Minion for 5 seconds, then kills it to summon a <link="actor_info:Cleaver>Cleaver</link>.Keep the sacrifice alive or lose it!

name: Bridge Buddies
description: Summons an "Armored" Scrat on both bridges.They gain Frenzy if you own the bridge.

name: Cursebearer
description: Enemy ground Minions are Cursed while within 6 range of this hardy but slow fighter. The Cursed aura even persists for 5 seconds after his death!Spectral Essence.

name: Magma Cannon
description: This cannon fires flaming balls of magma at any enemies in range. For when you need more firepower.

name: Lost Legionnaires
description: They may be lost from their battalion, but these two hardy soldiers are great when you just need a couple extra.

name: Gambler's Ball
description: Casts either a <link="spell_info:HealingFireball>Healing Fireball</link> or a <link="spell_info:fireball>Fireball</link> at the targeted area.Like a certain serpent once said; "Luck iss a ssskill"

name: BandOfBrothers
description: BandOfBrothersDescription

name: Ravenous Swarmers
description: A few Swarmers, but if the last card you played was a Spell, they gain Rage and Frenzy.

name: AngryDragonWhelp
description: AngryDragonWhelpDescription

name: AngryRammer
description: AngryRammerDescription

name: Screaming Scrat
description: This Scrat screams so loud it taunts all enemy minions. Doesn't have Summoning Sickness. After 5 seconds he detonates for 60 damage to all close by ground units and buildings. Turns out strapping a mine to someone's head is one hell of a motivator.

name: Netherstep
description: Teleports friendly Minions in the area along the path to the enemy Master.The Shars'Rakk love sharing their magic - and other things...

name: Incubus
description: This fearless demon teleports at any ranged attacker using his area attack to create destruction.

name: Brutish Betrayer
description: Turncoat, RageThis guy also hates buildings, but he may be convinced to hate your own more!

name: BetrayerSpearThrowers
description: BetrayerSpearThrowersDescription

name: BetrayerCleaver
description: BetrayerCleaverDescription

name: BetrayerSuccubus
description: BetrayerSuccubusDescription

name: BetrayerDroneWalkers
description: BetrayerDroneWalkersDescription

name: Dragon Ball
description: It's a fireball, but if the last card you played was a Minion of cost 6 or more, it also summons a <link="actor_info:DragonWhelp>Dragon Whelp</link> where it lands!

name: A.I.M. Bot
description: This Drone Walker has the Automated Intelligent Murder system pre-loaded to gain Marksmanship and Shield. Now a solid attacker with no fear and no mercy.

name: Sniper Squad
description: Sometimes less is more, but when it comes to big guns that's definitely not the case!

name: Cheese Date
description: Summons a random 3-mana Scrat Minion card and give it Rage.

name: Sun Burn
description: Deal 10 damage 10 times to all units in a small area and give them Rage.

name: Clear Skies
description: A soothing wind clears the arena healing all Minions and Masters 250 health and removes Shield and Rage.

name: Rabid Prowler
description: Sacrifice: Gain Rage if you sacrificed at least 1 Slitherbound.Call Slitherbound.

name: Tantrum Throwers
description: ERROR_Summon [cv:RageThrowers.SummonAmount] [actorinfo:SpearThrowers,[r:SpearThrowers]], If you do not control any bridges summon [cv:RageThrowers.SummonAmounts*0] extra. They all gain [textinfo:[r:RageBuffDescription],[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].

name: Propeller Horde
description: ERROR_If a friendly minion has [textinfo:[r:RageBuffDescription],[mec:[r:RageBuff]]], summon [cv:PropellerHorde.SummonAmounts*0] more.

name: Empowered Soul Stealer
description: The Empowered Soul Stealer starts with 2 Souls.Starts with 4 souls instead if a friendly Minion has Rage.Call Slitherbound.

name: Crystal Archers
description: These Crystal Elves are deadly at long range, but fragile up close. Their Mana Surge enables them to shoot faster when you have enough mana.

name: Crystal Arcanist
description: Mana SurgeShe's read the books of the Crystal Spire for 216 years, now it's time to let loose! And boy is it fun to blow up groups of enemies!

name: Arcane Bolt
description: Stuns the highest health Ground Minion in the area.If it has 500 or less health, Destroy it instead.It’s a crystal that shoots lethal lightning - what more could you want?

name: Crystal Sentry
description: Mana SurgeThe Sentries of the Crystal Spire train for centuries to master their deadly glaives. They might save time by using a less complicated weapon, but where's the fun in that?

name: Armored Escort
description: Summons 2 Crystal Sentries with Mana Surge to escort the next Ranged Minion you play. No, not that kind of escort!

name: Crystal Construct
description: The Crystal Constructs act as both shield and stockpile for the magically dependent elven army. On summon it grants you 1 Mana

name: Lord-Sentinel Thelec
description: If you have 4 Spells in your deck, also summon 6 <link="actor_info:CrystalArcher>Crystal Archers</link>. The Lord-Sentinel truly leads from the front, using his Mana Surge to hold the line single-handedly.

name: Mana Puff Madness
description: Summons 4 Mana Puffs at the Master Tower for each team.Mana puffs are attracted to the flow of mana, but you can never know what they will do when they appear - besides look cute!

name: Wheel Of Doom
description: Hits every ground target in a line 2 times for 150 damage. If something survives both hits, the Wheel breaks.Invented by a madman and infused with magic, this Wheel damages friend and foe alike!

name: Nether Bat
description: The Nether Bat is optically challenged and will ignore targets most minions would not. It's a good thing it will sometimes teleport towards a random enemy Minion.

name: Bats Bats Bats
description: Summon 5 bats.

name: Wolf Among Sheep
description: ERROR_Summon [cv:WolfAmongSheep.SummonAmount] [actorinfo:Legionair,[r:Legionnaires]]. One of them gains [textinfo:[r:LycanthropyBuffDescription],[mec:[r:LycanthropyBuff]]] ([actorinfo:Werewolf,[r:Werewolf]]) at random.

name: BatInSheepClothing
description: They may be lost from their battalion, but these two hardy soldiers are great when you just need a couple extra.

name: Once Bitten
description: Give a random friendly ground Minion in the area Lycanthropy (Werewolf).Can only be played in your own arena.

name: Bats Bats Bats!
description: For the next 5 seconds summon 1 <link="actor_info:BlinkBat>Nether Bat</link> for each mana you spend.Multiple plays prolong duration, not effect.

name: Grasping Thorns
description: Untargetable.Enemy Minions who walk through Grasping Thorns are slowed to a speed of 2 and take 20 damage per second.

name: Lone Wolf
description: RageIf there are no other Friendly Minions when this Warrior is summoned, she gains Lycanthropy (Werewolf).

name: Howling Moon
description: Reduce all minions to 50% health and summon 2 <link="actor_info:Werewolf>Werewolves</link>.

name: Bahra the Witchwolf
description: When summoned, Bahra immobilizes all enemy ground Minions for 6 seconds.His powerful moonbeams spell doom for groups of enemies.Spectral Essence.

name: Shieldguard Of Light
description: Having an Armor of Light doesn't stop this Brother from bringing a shield into battle, making him hardier than his fellow warriors.He also uses it to charge nearby enemies!

name: Brothers Of Light
description: From the Chapter of Light, the very elite of the Empyrean army, these two soldiers come equipped with slow but heavy hitting maces and their imbued Armor of Light

name: Squire Puff
description: Once on the bridge, Squire Puff gives Rage to 5 random Friendly Minions, and then puffs out of play.Affected Empyrean minions also gain Shield.

name: Gor'Rakk Gate
description: Open a portal to the void and Summon either of the following with Turncoat: - 7x Swarmers, - 2x Dragon Whelps, - 1x Cleaver

name: Crakgul Doomcleaver
description: Crakgul inspires his demon brethren with a celebration of killing. Whenever killing a Minion or hitting the enemy tower, he reduces the mana cost of a random voidborne Card in hand by 1 until it is played.

name: Morgrul's Ragers
description: The savagery of Morgrul's elites inspires others to murder a little harderVoidborne Wound: When Morgrul's Ragers are Summoned, all friendly Minions gain Rage.

name: Shadow Whelp
description: A sneaky dragon, using the shadows to stay invisible while not attacking or taking damage. Deals triple damage when he attacks from invisibility.

name: Caeleth Dawnhammer
description: Commander of the elite VI regiment.Gains a Divine Shield when his Armor of Light triggers.Empyrean Army: Gains Taunt

name: Stormy
description: This clumsy cloud shoots Chain Lightning at enemies, unfortunately damaging itself in the process.Zen-Chi Flow: Double Stormy's health.

name: Shen Stormstrike
description: Stuns an enemy for 2 seconds. If they are already stunned, blast them for massive damage instead.Zen-Chi Flow: Stun all nearby enemies when played for 3 seconds.

name: Arful HypnoLancer
description: Hypnotizes Enemy minions when dealing damage

name: Poison Strike
description: Showers enemy Minions in the area with the noxious fluids of Akinlep the Tainted, inflicting Poison.

name: Jungle Jumble
description: Remove this card and shuffle 3 Zen-Chi cards into your deck.Reduce their mana cost by 1.

name: Zap Shrine
description: Stuns closest enemy for 2 seconds.Zen-Chi Flow: Stun all enemies within range for 3 seconds when played.

name: Rock Rivals
description: TauntWhen first summoned, also summon an enemy Living Statue with Frenzy at opponent's Master Tower.

name: Skeleton Horde
description: When summoned, collect 1 Spectral Essence.Skeletons are scrawny fighters, too weak to carry essence, but together they are formidable.

name: Jolo the Hero Scrat
description: 50% chance to avoid any damage.He's a bit of a showboat and gains Frenzy when Summoned if your hand is full of Scrat cards.

name: Nyrvir's Breath
description: Nyrvir swoops down and covers a large area with spiritfire, which burns all ground enemies.Accursed Ascension: Enemies that die in the fire join you as Skeletons.

name: Toll of the Dead
description: Summon an Undying Skeleton.After the second death, its remains linger on the field until..Accursed Ascension: Convert all remains left by this card into Undying Corpses.

name: Lone Scout
description: If there are no other Friendly Minions when Lone Scout is Summoned, gain 1 Mana.She works best in a party of one.Mana Surge

name: Haunting Hugger
description: All it wants in the afterlife is to give everyone a good haunting hug!Haunts its target, giving it Cursed and Spectral Essence.When the target dies, the Hugger reappears to find a new target.

name: Nyrvir the Fallen
description: Starts the battle as Nyrvir Slumbers. Fulfill Accursed Ascension to be able to summon Nyrvir. Impactful Entry, Mythic.Nyrvir breathes spiritfire at a large area. Swap This Card For Nyrvir Slumbers.

name: Spawn of Fury
description: Stun a random friendly minion, reduce it's max health by 50%, then summon a copy of it.

name: The Queen's Dragon
description: ERROR_The mighty [mec:[r:Nyrvir]] enters the battlefield with [mec:[av:Nyrvir.MaxHealth] Max Health and [av:Nyrvir.Damage] Damage (Dps: [dps:Nyrvir])]

name: Drain Life
description: Drain 100 health from the closest enemy Minion, transfering it to MorelliaUnholy Bargain: Drain 100 health from the 2 closest enemy Minions, transfering it to Morellia

name: Spirit
description: Give a random friendly Minion Spirit.Unholy Bargain: Give 2 random friendly Minions Spirit.

name: Skeletons
description: ERROR_[r:WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk1][mec:[r:WitchQueenPerk2]]: [r:WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk2]

name: Forbidden Knowledge
description: 2 of Morellia's 4+ mana spells costs 1 less until played. Does not stack.Unholy Bargain: 2 of Morellia's 4+ mana spells costs 2 less until played. Does not stack.

name: Book of the Dead
description: Replace your hand with pages from the Book of the Dead

name: Wreckinator 9000
description: This metal monster will first slice and dice, then slam and bam. At least until it Self-Destructs.Scrat engineering at its finest.

name: Caged Prowler
description: After 20 seconds the cage releases the <link="actor_info:Prowler>Prowler</link> and falls apart.Preferring not to face the vicious beasts, Slitherbound typically just activate the cage and run away. Fast.

name: Slithering Summons
description: Summon a Living Statue, Prowler or Soul Stealer.Sacrifice: reduce mana cost by 1 for each Slitherbound you sacrifice.Call Slitherbound.

name: Herald Ah'Mun
description: Holding the Eye of Xipetl allows Ah'Mun to cheat death once by performing Sacrifice: Heal 50 health for each Slitherbound sacrificed.Brutally lashes groups of enemies and can Call Slitherbound (2).

name: Sewer Scrat
description: When Sewer Scrat is hit by melee attackers, it inflicts Poison for 5 seconds.Living in the sewers of the great flying city of Bloon has... Side effects.

name: Scratillery
description: Fires 5 furry rockets that each summon a Scrat on impact.Scrat Swarm: Summoned Scrats gain Frenzy.

name: Boom Buggy
description: Rains a barrage of 6 missiles at random targets within range.Scrat Swarm: Gain Marksmanship.

name: Ritual of Servitude
description: Summon a random Minion Card with Mana cost equal to the lowest cost card that started in your deck other than this card.The bindings of the Slither Lords are not easily broken.
